content.detailedDescription:
Heading home through highway 58 towards bakersfield,i observed several bright lights in the sky in various locations through the sky. i took my phone camera and took pictures of them. there were at least 6-8 of them in the sky in various positions.They appeared to project a small exhaust as i got closer but the objects remained stationary in the sky.
the one that caught my eye was the one in a vertical upward pattern that remained stationary until i stopped the car near the town of keene. 
i got out of the car to take photos. as i was ready to take a photo of the stationary object with the small exhaust trail. something else approached it and appeared on a collision course with it. as it got closer to the object it moved to the right of the stationary object. i believe it was a jet fighter as it had quite the exhaust trail. as the object passed. it stayed stationary for what appeared quite sometime. 
i then was watching the objects slowly disappear including the small vapor trail associated with all of them.
i enhanced the best photo of the vertical object on my cell phone. it almost appears to look like a cylinder shape two distant colors dull metal on top and a brushed metal in the middle. the closest thing i would compare it to would be a bullet in a casing. 
the other photos mainly show the various directions of the objects located throughout the sky. 
the next day, i asked a few workers if they seen the lights over the town. another individual confirmed my observation but was in tulare 62 miles away from my view of it. 
the media reported meteor showers but i have lived in the area most of my life observing meteor showers. i have never seen any stay stationary for extended periods of time or an aircraft direct it's attention toward it.

i can send photos to you upon request and maybe you can enhance them better than my camera.
content.summary: Coming through mountain range observed and took photos of several objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was on my second floor deck smoking a cigarette. i was looking at the stars. i saw a crescent shaped object towards the west just above the tree line but low in the sky. i initially thought it was the moon but the light from the object was not uniform like the moon, there was some variation through the crescent. as i watched the object it faded slowly but not completely then slowly returned to the original brightness. i took out my android phone and downloaded google sky maps and pointed it towards the object just to be sure thinking it was the moon. the objects that came up was the perseus constellation and mirphak star. the object was stationary, there may have been a slight red light on the curve of the crescent but it could have been my eyes playing "tricks". i watched for maybe three minutes and needed to go inside to use the bathroom. i ran in as quick as i could and came out and the object was gone. i attached three photos there are two photos that are not zoomed in and the object on the right is a star.
content.summary: Cresent shaped object witnessed in maine sky.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo hovering at washington tidal basin.  seeking assistance to document phenomenon to present to media. will not be disappointed.
content.summary: Washington tidal basin ufo

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:30 am on 4/24/2012, i am driving to work westbound on i-40 north carolina at  exit 116 when i spotted this disc shaped object in front of me this was extremely bright and metallic, just slightly to the right above the tree line (see simulation photo).  my first thought it was a commercial aircraft and did not think any more of it, when it became pretty evident that it was not moving as it seemed to hovering this to the best of my judgment, i was travelling approximately 65 mph.
i continued to watch this craft for several seconds still trying to keep my on the road, interesting to note, there was very little traffic at this time. i again looked up only to find it had completely disappeared. total viewing time was estimated to be approx 30 seconds, and size was 1/3 of the full moon.
coincidentally and i must admit it did freaked me out for a moment. as  i lost sight of the craft, my garmin gps (only 3 months old) just suddenly turned itself on and gave me directions to go to edgewood drive in morganton, nc  which was another 11 miles away on i-40 exit 105.
content.summary: Spotted disc shape object on i-40 north carolina

content.detailedDescription:
Was golfing in afton, mn. approximate time 10:35 am. 04/24/2012 was crossing from one side of the fairway to the other to get to my golf ball. i should point out that there was not a single cloud in the sky today, nothing but blue sky. saw what i assumed was an airplane about 600 to 1000 feet in altitude and probably about half a mile away. i noticed it wasn't moving anywhere, then i thought maybe a helicopter for a split second, but it wasn't making any noise whatsoever.I stared at it for about 6 seconds or so. the person driving the golf cart got to my ball that was behind a tree, blocking my view of the craft/object. i still wasn't sure what i saw so i didn't say anything yet to the other person and i proceeded to hit my golf ball and get back on the golf cart. we pulled back onto the fairway and i looked for the object for further identification purposes.( i had my eye off the object for about 30 seconds at this point). the craft was gone! and was nowhere to be seen in the wide open blue sky. there was nowhere for this object to hide! it was definitely some type of craft. only possibility is it blinked out/went stealth mode or it took off so fast that it was completely of the sky in 30 seconds. 

when i found it appeared to be gone already, i jumped out of the cart and asked the driver if he saw that! (the ufo) he said no he didn't, i was bummed he hadn't seen it and he helped me comb the skies to no avail. it was gone! 

could be unrelated but, about an hour later there was a helicopter that was flying back and forth over the golf course. it wasn't a black helicopter or anything like that, looked like possibly a news helicopter. there was big letters on the side, but couldn't get the correct angle to read them. 

i wish i could identify the craft better, but it was far enough away that details are sketchy at best, however, i will say that this wasn't a light orb or anything like that, this what looked to be some type of physical craft, it looked metallic and had either lights or windows on the side, was hard to tell because of distance and i only saw it for about 6 seconds and most of that time i was trying to figure out what is was not, and didn't get a ton of further examination time. 

anyway was a pretty neat experience. i didn't get freaked out or anything like that, just wish i could have seen it longer and closer.
content.summary: Silent craft of some type. thought was a helicopter at first. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work near 144th thornton/northglenn area around 8:50 to 9:00 pm when i saw this light thing hovering. it was very bright as you can see in the video. i pulled over to the side of the road to film it, then a bunch of cars came and i didn't want to look suspicious on the side of the road so i quit filming and drove off. not sure what it was, where it went it kinda just flew off losing brightness the further away it went.
content.summary: I was driving around listening to music when i saw this light.

content.detailedDescription: I observed what i first believed to be a star, approximately 75 degrees above the horizon.  i believed it to be too early for a star to appear and so continued to watch the object from a lawn chair in my back yard.  it remained stationary at 115 degrees at approximately 30,000 to 40,000 feet agl.  after several minutes the object moved apporximately 15 degrees southward and remained there.  i went into the house for a pair of binoculars.  when i returned the object had moved back to its original position and remained there for several more minutes before it began moving in a northerly direction, maintaining the same altitude and exiting my sight at apporximately 10 degrees. the object appeared flat and circular. the entire episode lasted between 20 and 25 minutes.
content.summary: Flat, circular object white or reflecting sunlight moving south, returning to orignal position and then northward.

content.detailedDescription: While at my computer in the office i was listening to the police scanner.  someone had reported a hovering shiny disc/orb which was large here in rio rancho.  i went out in the back yard to see if i could see anything.  immediately i saw in the north sky what appeared to be a huge illuminated cloud.  it was massive and beautiful, highly detailed like ice crystals.  whatever was shining on it exposed the material in detail.  then immediately this huge shadow ascended slowly swallowing the light.... and then there was nothing.  this was late at night around 10:00 to 10:45 as the news was still on tv.  i couldn't not make out the shape or size of the object ascending, but it was massive and from my viewpoint, not far from me in the neighborhood.  perhaps two to four streets north of me.  i heard nothing more on the police scanner and nothing was reported on the news.  the only other witness that i know of was the person who reported it to the rio rancho police department.  thank you.
content.summary: Hovering shiny orb reported on police scanner, so i went outside to look.

content.detailedDescription: I have a game cam that i put out at night to see the local wildlife. my game cam picks up heat and is set to record for 15 second. after many taping, i have not ever seen anything like this.The game cam was looking over a golf coarse and the houses in the back ground are about 200 yrds. away.
content.summary: 2 sets of lights in a line

content.detailedDescription: Hd still image of the 2nd plane of the 9/11 terror attacks before it hit the south tower of the world trade center. i have used special technology to enhance the image and reveal the truth of what this plane really was! revealed for the first time ever! share this picture with your friends on facebook and twitter and expose the truth!
content.summary: 9/11 world trade center south tower 2nd plane

content.detailedDescription:
At the time, i had a daily habit of going to local libraries to pick up free books. it was when i was walking along ocean parkway in the direction of avenue x from avenue z ,heading to the library on avenue x, that i had my sighting. off to my left, i noticed a ,seemingly, toy-like object just above the row of houses. yes, it was that low to the ground. i quickly realized that this was something very unusual. it was a pyramid-shaped metallic object that was rotating as it was ascending into the sky. when i tell people about it, i describe it as being a pyramid-shaped capsule and as being toy-like. i know it was metallic because the sunlight reflected off of it just like sunlight would reflect off a shiny piece of metal. it didn't ascend straight up but actually ,maybe, at a 45 degree angle. the rotation or spin seemed to be somewhat slow but at a steady or consistent rate. maybe less than a minute after first spotting it, it disappeared through the clouds and i could no longer see it. my current thought on it is that it was taking off ,maybe, from someones roof at that time. i want to point out that this was in broad daylight in the middle of the afternoon and in a main area. it was very busy was alot of traffic and people and there were planes in the sky too. there were 2 people that were standing just a couple of feet in front of me ,while i had the sighting. unfortunately, i didn't say anything to them and i did wish ,afterward, that i had said something. but, there had to be other people who saw it too. 

 i always tell people about it even though the reaction is not good. i made sure that i remembered the date which was on april 06, 2004. i tell people about how this sighting was traumatizing to me because it ,momentarily, took me out of the reality ,so to speak, i'm used to and made me aware of another kind of existence. this existence being other-worldly. being a man of scientific thought, i always try to analyze and understand what i saw. i believe that the object was in some kind of anti-gravity space and it was rotating to provide gravity ,inside of it, for its occupants. but, no matter how much i think about it i can't know how it's doing it. just this past year, i came to a startling realization. it is quite possible that these pyramid-shaped objects were commonly seen back thousands of years ago and this could be what inspired the egyptians and others to build the pyramids. this may be what ancient civilizations did to pay worship to these objects.
content.summary: Rotating pyramid-shaped capsule ascending at an angle

content.detailedDescription:
I've witnessed ufo sighting the past three nights with each night with more activity then the last and saw a bunch of silver and red streaks crash or land in the empty field behind my house. i was followed after making attempts to contact by flashing my brights and waving them to come down after it followed me to my f
friends house it turned off it's brights which reminded me of a really bright reflection like a rainbow and the light went to the surface metal and it glowed like lightsaber orange when my friends came outside it stopped and went away though that was subday night. will observe and report back if anymore tonight. too shocked when i thought it was gonna land but i'll
try to get a video tonight
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Third night of obvo and it followed. seemed playfull the second night then distracted last night

content.detailedDescription: My husband was walking the dog about 10:20 and called me to come outside and see something. there was a huge (bigger than any star, smaller than the moon)very bright flashing light, like a flash bulb, at about 60 degrees above horizon and about due east. it didn't change position. i watched it flash about 5 times and then called 2 of my sons to come out. it was beginning to flash with lower intensity. they both saw it, but were not very impressed, because they thought it must be a satellite and they are teenage cynics. it was much brighter than any airplane light, and not moving. my husband and i stayed outside watching and then the flashes grew farther apart and dimmer, and the object appeared to be moving up and to northeast as it faded away completely.
content.summary: Incredibly bright light hovered and flashed about every 5 secs then faded up

content.detailedDescription: Was just sitting out looking up at the sky talking to other witness about how nice and clear the sky's are in northern manitoba.  i then said oh a falling star..But it wastn't.  these 2 red lights hovered for a second and flashed and then flashed as they whipped across the sky in a south easterly direction and then it was gone or at least out of site.  it lasted approximately 10 seconds.  my friend and i looked at each other and said "did we just see what we saw?  no one is going to believe us, but we saw it and said cheers glad we witnessed that."  we both were ecstatic at what we saw.  i checked my phone for the exact time and made a note.
content.summary: 2 flashing red lights close together..Flashed on spot then blinked & moved south

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was laying on the trampoline in the back yard watching for the meteor shower and she said look look.  i figured it was a meteor but when i looked i observed two dim green glowing lights going backwards and forwards.  it made no sound that we heard and it was only a couple hundred feet in the air.  we watched it for about 30 secs until the lights was gone.  i never could make out an object just the two lights which i figured was the bottom of the craft since it went directly above us. the lights seem to be oval shape with black waves through them.  glowing dimly and pulsating.
content.summary: Wife and i saw two green lights above us

content.detailedDescription:
i live on the outside of town where there are hardly any street lights and it is plenty dark. i've long had an interest in astronomy, my own telescope, and fair knowledge of direction and the stars. i am inclined to be analytical, and skeptic. i can honestly say i've never bore witness to any crazy unusual sites - before tonight. 
 right around 9 o'clock i decided to go for a walk. it's a beautiful night, and i ended up going further than i planned (4 or 5 miles). on my way back home, coming down our long private road and watching the stars, i noticed a sort of strange glowing light. initially resembling a star, it quickly became immensely bright and seemed to waver, like someone signaling with a mag light in the dead of night. i started to question myself and looked away. revert my gaze i thought, it's been a long walk. i noticed a helicopter moving to my east whereas the "whatever" in question was to the west. i deliberately noted the difference in volume, luminance, and velocity. 
 upon looking again it's actions were exaggerated. glowing, then stable, then gone altogether. i have witnessed similar patterns from sirius, but these conditions were different and this was by far a more dramatic experience. it was absolutely silent and seemed to change it's location relative to mine as if it were not so far away. i was genuinely afraid, having never seen a thing like it.
 by the time i reached home, it had come and gone 4 or 5 times, then disappeared entirely. so i don't want to be looked at like a fool but i'd like to put this out there for whatever value it may be worth. i'm still trying to make myself believe it was make believe, but take from my story what you will.
content.summary: It scared me and i don't believe in hocus pocus

content.detailedDescription: It passed quietly, smoothly and fast in between paul's tree tops in his backyard.Altitude seemed low, but, hard to tell that and it's size because of the brief time it was in sight very much like a sighting my wife and i had in the florida keys in the late 90s. i had finished 2nd shift at 10 pm and had stopped at a freinds to drink beer arouhd his firepit. we both saw the lights. (it wasn't the 2 beers i had consumed, either.)it was just lucky we were both looking up at the sky right at the time or we'd have missed it. no sound! no strobe/flashing lights or colored lights, just white lights as bright as medium stars in a stable triangle shape. no wind, no clouds. i was just happy that my friend saw it, too. i checked my watch for the time and then made sure we had just seen the same thing. as much as i was hoping, tho, it didn't show up again in the next hour before i left.
content.summary: Looking at stars in a freind's backyard. i saw the lights moving and said "paul, look at that!" he saw it also. we both confirmed it wasn't birds and had 3 lights and moved from e to nw smoothly.I was shocked because i had a sighting very similar yrs ago.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen the same type at my workplace and it followed me home and then another one appeared. the one that hangs out at work is larger than a star and brighter and moves from one side of the building to the other. another one appeared on highway 150 between waco and cherryville. it was sort of blue and white larger than the starlike one. they both disappeared when i got past food lion in cherryville. after this i saw a plane with red blinking lights. i got home and went outside and the ufo's are not there. i felt happy! i was not afraid of them. i wanted to go find them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Something following me home from work

content.detailedDescription:
I am located @ 40���1'20.8"n by 79���51'6.1"w.

i was watching tv when a light from my window caught my eye.  the light was not like a normal airplane.  this light was solid white with a slight yellow tint.  it also had a slight twinkle to it.  it moved across the sky and would slow down then speed back up.  
i noticed behind the object was first 1 plane/jet then another.  then another coming from another 

 the object.  they all seemed to 
be following or chasing this object.
content.summary: Large glowing white with yellow tint object seen, chased by aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: Huge fireball in the sky of southern louisiana...Its fireball season
content.summary: Major "fireball" filmed over southern louisiana..Or ufo?

content.detailedDescription: i was at home late in the evening, between nine and ten p.M. i went outside to have a smoke on my patio. i almost always check out the stars, especially where orion's belt is. orion's belt on this night was in the southern sky. i happened to look straight up and saw a very strange craft. at first,i thought it was a satellite or perhaps the space station, but then i realized the shape was completely wrong and way to large. it was very long, with four very dim lights in a row, with 3 very bright lights at 45 degree angle at the very front of the object. it seemed to be very large because it also seemed be very high, approx. 20,000 ft. it was elongated, rectangular, long and thin. approx. 100-200 yards long. it made no sound, and moved from horizon to horizon in a matter of 2-3 minutes. the edges of the craft were darkened and blocked out the stars. the night was perfectly clear and the stars were bright. after about a minute, i couldn't take my eyes off of it. i didn't want to miss anything! so i decided not to run inside to grab my camera or phone. i then focused on remembering what i saw and concentrated on drawing a picture of this incredible event.
content.summary: Looked up and saw an elongated craft, moving from west to east. did not know what it was.

content.detailedDescription: I took my camera outside to take a photo of the sunset over the blue ridge mountains and also the contrails above. a clyndrical disc object appeared moving across the sky heading southwest. i could see the sun clearing reflected off the top of the metallic object.
content.summary: Clyndrical disc oblect moved across sky heading southwest

content.detailedDescription: On saturday night april 21, 2012 i observed an extremely bright star in the west and on sunday evening april 22, 2012 i wanted my husband to see the star, so i went into the back yard to see if the star was visible yet.  it was, so i stepped back to the back porch to have my husband come and see and as i approched the door there was a loud "boom" (like an explosion sound) and my husband was coming out as he had heard the noise also---i had him walk with me out into the yard to see the star and as i was pointing it out to him we saw an extremely bright green flashing light, then a extremely bright red flashing light a little distance west of the green one.  they were moving very fast toward the south and thru a clearing between the trees we could see a red light farther south from the other 2 lights. the whole event took about 30 seconds.  we stayed out a few minutes looking for more but we did not see anything else. the event took place at 8:50 pm.  i have never seen anything like that ever.  it was exciting but at the same time disturbing.
content.summary: Saw 3 fast moving 'blinking' lights - 2-red 1- green extremely bright.  headed south .  lasted only about 30 seconds and then we lost sight of them.

content.detailedDescription: Leaving work in my worn truck. and looked up and saw a bright light brighter than any star planet or airplane i've ever seen. it jumped around a lot so new it was none of the above the video is the best example.
content.summary: Looked up and saw this object moving around.

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting outside smoking a cigarette with my boyfriend when i noticed this orange light in the sky.I noticed the object because the stars were out was staring at them and i was thinking about when the next meteor shower was going to be. i pointed it out to him and we were trying to figure out what it was. i asked him if he thought it was a air plane,but we both thought air planes don't have orange lights on them. too orange to be a helicopter, but we took that in consideration at first before thinking anything else.We sat there to listen to see if it was a helicopter,but it didn't give off any sound. then we also thought maybe it was a sky lantern. so we kept looking at it,but it didn't go all over the place like a sky lantern nor it flicker like one either. it looked like it was coming towards us like how a air plane would look like when it first takes off into the sky,then it went up straight slowly into the sky eventually the light was gone. when this was all happening i did not feel fear what so ever was pretty calm the whole time. after the sighting i just said that was odd and just left it at that.
content.summary: Bright orange light,ascending into the sky slowly,slowly the light went up further it went up.

content.detailedDescription:
"i am an avid sky watcher in the summer months. i am also an engineer"

this report was written by a ninny. who is paying for these bogus reports ?

when president clinton asked for more information from the us military, he was told "that is on a 'need-to-know basis', and you don't need to know."
content.summary: Re: 2011-08-01  oh  ufo investigates a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
We where eating outside and then my dad sayd : wow! look at that!
we all stood up and we have seen a round shaped fireball object going up,down,up,left,right.
i ran to get my telescope .... but it was too late.
the light was dimming and it was gone.
i first taught it was a u.F.O.
i was scarred and amazed too.
content.summary: It went up then down then up again to the left to the right and went away very very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Because of all i have experienced, before and after this event, i have told my story. below is just a part of that story. 

fyi, i have thousands of pictures from the same camera in the exact same location to help support these experiences. and there are no comparisons. i love photography and am blessed to live in a place so beautiful it begs to be photographed...So i do!

***  

i headed down to the beach to take sunset pictures for a photo contest. as soon as i got down to the sand i noticed a sandcastle and thought it would make for a cool shot with the sunset in the background. i was using a 6��� baby tripod for the first time to get as steady a shot as i could. i set the camera on the sand and kind of blindly pointed in the direction of the sandcastle and sunset. i snapped picture after picture hoping to get one that was really good. there was a couple at the waters��� edge that i tried to incorporate into the scene along with others strolling by. everything just seemed ripe for a really cool shot! 

i was eager to get home and see how my pictures came out. for the most part i was disappointed; bad lighting, unbalanced, blurry, etc. etc. etc. but one���one was very, very cool! that couple down at the waters��� edge was split perfectly with a spire from the sand castle. that was my winning shot! 

i took that picture and put it into my, ���best pics��� folder, which separated it from the 160 or so others i took that evening. but, while the picture was beautiful there was something wrong with it. looking back i had noticed only subconsciously that the sky was messy or flawed in some way. but i never really looked. i was probably distracted by the couple being perfectly split by that sandcastle spire. i couldn���t see what i captured at the time so it was plain luck. then, about a week or two later after viewing the picture many times, i actually looked at the sky for the first time. at first inspection i noticed a bunch of thin streaks in the distance ��� 25 in all. then i looked into upper left hand corner - almost out of the picture ��� and wow, a space craft?! you could clearly see a metallic, v-shape rear end with the ���v��� pointing down, and a sleek look consistent with the distant objects. shortly afterwards i was able to link them all together when i noticed one of the streaks in the sky - directly under the crescent moon - had a light, or metallic shine off the back consistent with the close up object. this is a scene that comes from another world, not off the beaches of so cal! 
 
regardless of what these things are and where they come from, this one picture seems to me the most telling single picture i have ever seen of possible alien craft. the one craft is only 200-300��� over that couples heads yet they, myself and the few hundred other potential witnesses were clueless as to what was going on above them! 

from that point on i have gone down to the beach with the thought of trying to photograph, cloaked, or unseen craft.  i knew the time and conditions had to be just right to see these things or else pictures like this would be all over the place!
 
then on january 27th at about 6:45pm i started heading up the ramp after taking a bunch of pictures and decided to take one last look at the beautiful view. i immediately noticed an unusual craft flying over a nearby bluff top resort so i calmly walked back down to a nearby life guard tower for steady pictures and video. it was a huge glow of light with no other lights flashing and traveled along the bluff and over multimillion dollar homes. pictures would show this thing having the shape of a typical ���flying saucer���, but it didn't look like that at the time or in the video. this event was witnessed with 3 others, and they were sure it was a ���ufo���. lack of out-of-this-world movement i had experienced twice before had me unsure as it was happening, but after seeing the picture i was convinced. 

then on february 23rd - my birthday ��� my girlfriend and i went to a beach in south laguna called, thousand steps. just before leaving she got a picture of me with the sand and ocean in the background and clouds in the sky. later on that day i was looking through the pictures and noticed a dot in the sky. i zoomed in and was surprised to see what looked like an eye! after making adjustments to the picture i was clearly able to see a rounded top right above the ���eye��� giving it the look of a typical flying saucer. i couldn���t believe it; i had my third experience in 89 days!
 
from that point i told my daughter to start checking her pictures for unusual things in the sky. a few weeks later she sends me two pictures that show unusual things flying in the sky. one picture had a single object that looked like a potential space craft and the other had 10 of them! 

funny thing is, even though i told her to check her pictures, i never did a very good job at checking my own! in fact, i went through thousands of pictures before i realize i never went through the pictures that contain my cloaked craft! duh!!! okay, this is going to be fun! 

i started from the very beginning which contains shots from long before the sun sets, and when i felt i might start seeing them. and as it got darker these streaks started appearing. one here, four there, and so on. but, the closer i got to my 'winning' shot these streaks started filling up the sky. the one before had about 15 streaks, one of which had an obvious, v-shape shine off the back consistent with the close up craft. i knew the next picture was the one i separated that had the close-up, so the one after that would be the next one i see. i clicked the arrow and got a glimpse of a bright shiny object in the sky. it literally startled me and i through my computer off my lap. i wasn���t ready to see what i knew i was going to see; a much better picture than the first, and the first was amazing! i was so excited, but i needed a break. 15 minutes later i pick the computer back up and looked in amazement; a better close-up, and nine craft with lights or metallic shines on the back! and the close-up this time is flying upside down compared to the first one. you can easily see the v-shape shine and whether it���s flying right side up or upside down. although, who knows which is which! because of the v-shape light, or reflection it's easy to see on a few of them whether the v is up or down.  

i alos have a couple pictures showing the ���streaks��� heading into, or coming out of the ocean, so it would appear that���s where they come from. i also have pictures showing very long and skinny craft seemingly just sitting in the sky. over exposure prevented me from seeing those for some time. 

after uncovering all those amazing photos i decided to get serious about this and see what more i could come up with. getting dark later has made it more difficult to get pictures at the right time. i���m a sports nut so i���m watching my teams play later in the evening when conditions are best for seeing these things. but, i was dying to put my prediction to test that they start becoming visible about 20-30 after the sun sets. i looked at what time my sunset pictures were taken and felt that���s about when i might see something. 

i stayed later at the beach than normal then headed home - a 6 minute walk to my door step. as i approached my door i clicked a few pictures into the sky. once inside i went out onto the deck to continue taking pictures. i shot directly above me and out toward the ocean. i can���t see the beach itself but i can see the sky above it. i took approximately 200 in total.
 
later that night i went through every picture with a fine tooth comb. i started getting a little nervous as the time approached that i thought might produce something. nervous because i wanted to be right, but also a little fear that i might see something i didn���t want to see!

at about exactly when i thought i���d see something i get a picture of a weird shape cloud and a thick, red, s-shape electric charge running through it! this was bizarre!!! looking at the clouds in the surrounding pictures you don���t see this distinctly shaped cloud. it seems to have just appeared out of nowhere!
 
the next three pictures each had a different craft with the last one being a jaw dropper! it���s a huge tri pontoon ship way up in the sky. it looks so solid that it seemingly had to be visible if you knew it was there. the next night i got three successive pictures of that craft traveling slowly through a cloudy, overcast sky. i did not see it at the time. in working to bring more clarity into the picture it appears each pontoon is lined with windows. i felt a better camera would have allowed me to see inside this thing! much later i also noticed a 5th different craft that would have been the first of five consecutive craft. 

for about a week straight i took pictures into the night from my deck and came up with all kinds of interesting things, including a few pictures of what appear to be that long, skinny craft in the night sky. i can see the front and back, but not in between. it seems somebody could measure both to see if it is indeed the same long and skinny cloaked craft from the sunset shots.

by now i���m tired of taking pictures of the night sky and am dying to get back to the beach for some late dawn skies. i���m not getting pictures like i did the first week and i���m wanting to feed my curiosity, not to mention, build my ufo portfolio. who knows what crazy scenes i can capture?!
 
over a week ago i watched a cool video of people in northern california videotaping cloaking in progress. they witnessed several craft that would appear and disappear in a partly cloudy, dawn sky. there almost seemed to be a relationship or some kind of link between the cloud and these cloaking craft. so when i saw an interesting cloud formation i paid a lot more attention to it than normal. and i���m glad i did!
 
i soon saw what at first glance appeared to be a plane flying south along the coast. but, the light was way too brilliant.  i watched as it first traveled toward/through this cloud at a normal and consistent speed similar to a plane. but, then it started ���slide stepping���, and planes don���t do that! it started hesitantly coming south at what appeared to be about 2,000���- 3,000' high ��� same height as this weird cloud it was flying along. what happens next is what i���ve been thinking was going on (based on prior experiences); this so called plane stopped in mid flight and became a ���star��� the rest of the evening! i���ve got pictures and video that help support my account. 

what i didn't see at the time is even better. one of those long, skinny craft meeting up with the so called star, all of which i'll write more about later. 

this is ongoing. i am willing to talk about this and participate in any investigation. but, i need to protect my pictures and can't just send them out. to me they are so incredibly amazing and valuable that i need to figure this all out. i will go ahead and send a few so you can get an idea, but we need to talk to go any further. 

thanks
content.summary: Unseen and unheard craft over unsuspecting peoples' heads

content.detailedDescription:
Because of all i have experienced, before and after this event, i have told my story. below is just a part of that story. 

fyi, i have thousands of pictures from the same camera in the exact same location to help support these experiences. and there are no comparisons. i love photography and am blessed to live in a place so beautiful it begs to be photographed...So i do!

***  

i headed down to the beach to take sunset pictures for a photo contest. as soon as i got down to the sand i noticed a sandcastle and thought it would make for a cool shot with the sunset in the background. i was using a 6��� baby tripod for the first time to get as steady a shot as i could. i set the camera on the sand and kind of blindly pointed in the direction of the sandcastle and sunset. i snapped picture after picture hoping to get one that was really good. there was a couple at the waters��� edge that i tried to incorporate into the scene along with others strolling by. everything just seemed ripe for a really cool shot! 

i was eager to get home and see how my pictures came out. for the most part i was disappointed; bad lighting, unbalanced, blurry, etc. etc. etc. but one���one was very, very cool! that couple down at the waters��� edge was split perfectly with a spire from the sand castle. that was my winning shot! 

i took that picture and put it into my, ���best pics��� folder, which separated it from the 160 or so others i took that evening. but, while the picture was beautiful there was something wrong with it. looking back i had noticed only subconsciously that the sky was messy or flawed in some way. but i never really looked. i was probably distracted by the couple being perfectly split by that sandcastle spire. i couldn���t see what i captured at the time so it was plain luck. then, about a week or two later after viewing the picture many times, i actually looked at the sky for the first time. at first inspection i noticed a bunch of thin streaks in the distance ��� 25 in all. then i looked into upper left hand corner - almost out of the picture ��� and wow, a space craft?! you could clearly see a metallic, v-shape rear end with the ���v��� pointing down, and a sleek look consistent with the distant objects. shortly afterwards i was able to link them all together when i noticed one of the streaks in the sky - directly under the crescent moon - had a light, or metallic shine off the back consistent with the close up object. this is a scene that comes from another world, not off the beaches of so cal! 
 
regardless of what these things are and where they come from, this one picture seems to me the most telling single picture i have ever seen of possible alien craft. the one craft is only 200-300��� over that couples heads yet they, myself and the few hundred other potential witnesses were clueless as to what was going on above them! 

from that point on i have gone down to the beach with the thought of trying to photograph, cloaked, or unseen craft.  i knew the time and conditions had to be just right to see these things or else pictures like this would be all over the place!
 
then on january 27th at about 6:45pm i started heading up the ramp after taking a bunch of pictures and decided to take one last look at the beautiful view. i immediately noticed an unusual craft flying over a nearby bluff top resort so i calmly walked back down to a nearby life guard tower for steady pictures and video. it was a huge glow of light with no other lights flashing and traveled along the bluff and over multimillion dollar homes. pictures would show this thing having the shape of a typical ���flying saucer���, but it didn't look like that at the time or in the video. this event was witnessed with 3 others, and they were sure it was a ���ufo���. lack of out-of-this-world movement i had experienced twice before had me unsure as it was happening, but after seeing the picture i was convinced. 

then on february 23rd - my birthday ��� my girlfriend and i went to a beach in south laguna called, thousand steps. just before leaving she got a picture of me with the sand and ocean in the background and clouds in the sky. later on that day i was looking through the pictures and noticed a dot in the sky. i zoomed in and was surprised to see what looked like an eye! after making adjustments to the picture i was clearly able to see a rounded top right above the ���eye��� giving it the look of a typical flying saucer. i couldn���t believe it; i had my third experience in 89 days!
 
from that point i told my daughter to start checking her pictures for unusual things in the sky. a few weeks later she sends me two pictures that show unusual things flying in the sky. one picture had a single object that looked like a potential space craft and the other had 10 of them! 

funny thing is, even though i told her to check her pictures, i never did a very good job at checking my own! in fact, i went through thousands of pictures before i realize i never went through the pictures that contain my cloaked craft! duh!!! okay, this is going to be fun! 

i started from the very beginning which contains shots from long before the sun sets, and when i felt i might start seeing them. and as it got darker these streaks started appearing. one here, four there, and so on. but, the closer i got to my 'winning' shot these streaks started filling up the sky. the one before had about 15 streaks, one of which had an obvious, v-shape shine off the back consistent with the close up craft. i knew the next picture was the one i separated that had the close-up, so the one after that would be the next one i see. i clicked the arrow and got a glimpse of a bright shiny object in the sky. it literally startled me and i through my computer off my lap. i wasn���t ready to see what i knew i was going to see; a much better picture than the first, and the first was amazing! i was so excited, but i needed a break. 15 minutes later i pick the computer back up and looked in amazement; a better close-up, and nine craft with lights or metallic shines on the back! and the close-up this time is flying upside down compared to the first one. you can easily see the v-shape shine and whether it���s flying right side up or upside down. although, who knows which is which! because of the v-shape light, or reflection it's easy to see on a few of them whether the v is up or down.  

i alos have a couple pictures showing the ���streaks��� heading into, or coming out of the ocean, so it would appear that���s where they come from. i also have pictures showing very long and skinny craft seemingly just sitting in the sky. over exposure prevented me from seeing those for some time. 

after uncovering all those amazing photos i decided to get serious about this and see what more i could come up with. getting dark later has made it more difficult to get pictures at the right time. i���m a sports nut so i���m watching my teams play later in the evening when conditions are best for seeing these things. but, i was dying to put my prediction to test that they start becoming visible about 20-30 after the sun sets. i looked at what time my sunset pictures were taken and felt that���s about when i might see something. 

i stayed later at the beach than normal then headed home - a 6 minute walk to my door step. as i approached my door i clicked a few pictures into the sky. once inside i went out onto the deck to continue taking pictures. i shot directly above me and out toward the ocean. i can���t see the beach itself but i can see the sky above it. i took approximately 200 in total.
 
later that night i went through every picture with a fine tooth comb. i started getting a little nervous as the time approached that i thought might produce something. nervous because i wanted to be right, but also a little fear that i might see something i didn���t want to see!

at about exactly when i thought i���d see something i get a picture of a weird shape cloud and a thick, red, s-shape electric charge running through it! this was bizarre!!! looking at the clouds in the surrounding pictures you don���t see this distinctly shaped cloud. it seems to have just appeared out of nowhere!
 
the next three pictures each had a different craft with the last one being a jaw dropper! it���s a huge tri pontoon ship way up in the sky. it looks so solid that it seemingly had to be visible if you knew it was there. the next night i got three successive pictures of that craft traveling slowly through a cloudy, overcast sky. i did not see it at the time. in working to bring more clarity into the picture it appears each pontoon is lined with windows. i felt a better camera would have allowed me to see inside this thing! much later i also noticed a 5th different craft that would have been the first of five consecutive craft. 

for about a week straight i took pictures into the night from my deck and came up with all kinds of interesting things, including a few pictures of what appear to be that long, skinny craft in the night sky. i can see the front and back, but not in between. it seems somebody could measure both to see if it is indeed the same long and skinny cloaked craft from the sunset shots.

by now i���m tired of taking pictures of the night sky and am dying to get back to the beach for some late dawn skies. i���m not getting pictures like i did the first week and i���m wanting to feed my curiosity, not to mention, build my ufo portfolio. who knows what crazy scenes i can capture?!
 
over a week ago i watched a cool video of people in northern california videotaping cloaking in progress. they witnessed several craft that would appear and disappear in a partly cloudy, dawn sky. there almost seemed to be a relationship or some kind of link between the cloud and these cloaking craft. so when i saw an interesting cloud formation i paid a lot more attention to it than normal. and i���m glad i did!
 
i soon saw what at first glance appeared to be a plane flying south along the coast. but, the light was way too brilliant.  i watched as it first traveled toward/through this cloud at a normal and consistent speed similar to a plane. but, then it started ���slide stepping���, and planes don���t do that! it started hesitantly coming south at what appeared to be about 2,000���- 3,000' high ��� same height as this weird cloud it was flying along. what happens next is what i���ve been thinking was going on (based on prior experiences); this so called plane stopped in mid flight and became a ���star��� the rest of the evening! i���ve got pictures and video that help support my account. 

what i didn't see at the time is even better. one of those long, skinny craft meeting up with the so called star, all of which i'll write more about later. 

this is ongoing. i am willing to talk about this and participate in any investigation. but, i need to protect my pictures and can't just send them out. to me they are so incredibly amazing and valuable that i need to figure this all out. i will go ahead and send a few so you can get an idea, but we need to talk to go any further. 

thanks
content.summary: Numerous invisible space craft above unknowing peoples' heads

content.detailedDescription:
On 4/22/2012 i was driving down lambert creek aound milepost 1 heading towards hwy 21. i looked up in the sky and saw a bright ball of light slowing moving towards the south east direction. the object i saw was well within the atomosphere nothing like a satelite or known crafts i have seen in the area. as the object moved it was unsteady almost like a weaving motion. i stopped my vehicle and got out and attempted to signal the craft with my laser illuminator right as it was directly above me. i notified my parter on the radio who also oberserved the craft heading southeast. as i was siganllly the craft when it was overhead before i lost sight of it becaseu of the treeline to my south. the craft dimmed its lights down. i thought it was the last i would see of it so i got back in my vehicle and turned onto hwy 21 heading south towards republic. as i was driving south i looked out the drivers side window looking east and observed the bright light heading directly south almost like it was parralleling my vehicle. i notified my parter who also this on the other side of curlew lake. i then slowed my vehicle down and stopped to get a better look. as i stopped the craft dimmed its light down and turned around like making a u turn in the sky and began heading in the north west direction. my partner also observed the craft heading north until he lost sight of it.
if someone from mufon wants more information i would be happy to share.
content.summary: Bright ball of light dimmed lights when signaled then turned 180 degrees
